permissions: User must be an admin or be authorized to update the related project (per project policy).
side_effects: Creates a project cancellation action and transitions the project status to cancelled.
validation_notes: Project ID is required and must be a non-empty string. Project must exist. Project must currently be in approved status to cancel.

flags.name: --project
flags.validation: Required; must be a non-empty string.

flags.name: --comment
flags.description: Comment for the cancellation. Example: "Customer withdrew".
